tool_description: Estimates delivery timeframes and provides delivery date ranges based on carrier service levels and current conditions.

ship_date.description: Planned ship date in YYYY-MM-DD format

error_messages: Invalid ship date: Ship date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and not in the past
Unsupported carrier service: Carrier and service combination not recognized
Invalid ZIP codes: Origin or destination ZIP format is incorrect
Holiday impact: Estimated delivery may be affected by holidays (estimate adjusted)
usage: Provide carrier_code, service_type, ship_date, and ZIP codes to estimate delivery timeframes.

estimated_delivery_date.description: Most likely delivery date in YYYY-MM-DD format

transit_days.description: Expected number of business days in transit

confidence_level.description: Confidence in delivery estimate (high, medium, low)
